page.title: 05FULNECK POTTERY
page.content: Having been established twenty years, the{FULNECK POTTERY,}owned by{MOLLIE {HILLAM,}a very experienced and skilled potter, has seen many changes of style over the years.When she first started, she made{domestic stoneware,}whereas now most items are thinly potted {porcelain,}incised or embossed. In her range of pottery there are {vases, pictures and plaques,}all of which show her individual style of designs based on{natural forms,}e.g. delicate trees cut out of porcelain. She has to work fast:"When once you start a piece, you have to work on it at once or it loses its character." Her high quality work can be seen in various galleries and shops throughout the{United Kingdom}and is exported around the world, including such countries as{Norway, Japan and West {Germany. }
